extendedInfo.description: Mandarin Baby Flash Cards for Kids is now available for Android!  Categories include: Food items, Animals, Alphabet, Transportation, Numbers, Colors, Shapes, Clothing, Household items, Body Parts, Outdoor items, Music Instruments/Arts & Learning. â Over 450 words! â 11 Categories - All in 1 App! â FREE! â Kids tested - they love it! Parents tested - they love it! â Building vocabulary has never been so much fun â Large words and letters â Large icons and buttons â Professional voice overs recorded in production studio â High quality images â Real sounds where applicable â Question mode for parent-child interaction â Great memory building exercise Building strong Chinese (Mandarin) vocabulary has never been so exciting for preschoolers and toddlers. EFlashApps Educational Baby Flash Cards in Mandarin features over 450 high quality images with text and voice overs. There are additional real sounds where applicable (such as a lion's roar or an ambulance siren) to enhance visual and auditory learning and memory simultaneously. Parents have the option to turn voice overs off during parent-child learning session and turn voice overs on when the child is self-learning. They can enable Question Mode to display 4 images and ask the child to click on the right answer. Complexity of words is perfect for ages 1 to 4 so two or more young siblings can play together and even teach each other!

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Have used mandarin and English versions.  Great for my little one to learn.  Has a wide variety of flash cards
reviews.author: Michael Hwa

reviews.title: Acceptable
reviews.comment: Too many mistakes. The number \"five\" is \344\272\224, not \344\270\207. \"Bat\" is \350\235\231\350\235\240, not \347\220\203\346\211\263. It\'s best parents using this app should hv some acknowledge of the chinese language, else u may end up teaching your precious one the wrong stuff. Overall app is acceptable, just a few mistakes here and there.
reviews.author: Karmee karmee

reviews.title: Very good apps, but mistakes should be avoid
reviews.comment: I have downloaded the   for a few months, it is excellent, the pictures are real and clear, it is very good for little ones to learn, my son loves it\357\274\201   Today i got the Chinese version, everything are good as English one except some mistakes in writings and pronouciation are:    food item orange should pronouce Cheng zi \346\251\231\345\255\220 not Jian bing\347\205\216\351\245\274\343\200\202  Animal item bat  pronouce Bian Fu \350\235\231\350\235\240 not Qiu bang\347\220\203\346\243\222.  Numbers number five in writing is \344\272\224not \344\270\207,pls check all the numbers include 5 for ex. 15,25etc.

reviews.title: Wrong character
reviews.comment: Hi. Your chinese character for no. 5 is wrong. It should be \344\272\224, and not \344\270\207as it is currently shown.  Also \346\251\231 is currently read as\347\205\216\351\245\274 Please correct both to score five stars.  Thank u.
reviews.author: Pek See Lim

reviews.title: Life Changing.
reviews.comment: This app has rescued me from great sadness and brought me a new love of life. I thank you with all of my heart!
reviews.author: Peter Kruse

reviews.title: good stuff
reviews.comment: This is really good app for  my kids learning Chinese at home, just  download it, learn it~
reviews.author: kitty truong
